title: Citrix security advisory (AV25-374)
description: On June 25, 2025, Citrix published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 14.1  versions prior to 14.1-47.46
NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 13.1  versions prior to 13.1-59.19
NetScaler ADC 13.1-FIPS and NDcPP  versions prior to 13.1-37.236-FIPS and NDcPP
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
